snippet: The American Lawyer magazine plans to revise the last two years of financial results for Dewey & LeBoeuf, the New York law firm struggling with a wave of partner departures.
abstract: The American Lawyer magazine plans to revise the last two years of financial results for Dewey & LeBoeuf, the New York law firm struggling with a wave of partner departures.

headline.main: American Lawyer to Revise Dewey's Financials
